As in the sulfate system, recovery of valuable elements in the chloride system can be precipitated as hydroxides or carbonates [ 74, 169]. Freitas et al. used electrodeposition and electrowinning as refining and extraction steps, respectively, at the end of which metallic cobalt was recovered [ 162]. Furthermore, organic extracting agent PC-88A offers very good selectivity for cobalt over lithium with a separation factor (
β
Co / Li
) of up to 1.3 × 10 5 [ 42].
